website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for cats who love hiding in small, enclosed spaces.
pros: Twinkle lights catch cat's attention, but can also be quite calming
Tunnel has string ties so it can be secured to a table or chair to avoid slipping
Tunnel folds flat for convenient space-saving storage
Top cutout is fun for cats to poke their heads out
cons: Twinkle lights are too dim for some owners' tastes

customer_reviews.title: A bit small for our “full figured” cat
customer_reviews.text: Do I like it? Seems well-made and sturdy. If I were a cat I’d for sure go in! But, it is on the small side, and we fear our full figured lady cat might be intimidated by the small size. She has gone in to retrieve treats, we think, but have never actually witnessed it. This would be great for a smaller cat though. The lights are fun and the material seems durable. Got it at a great price so if she doesn’t warm up to it, I’ll gladly donate to the shelter.
customer_reviews.author: Kriston

customer_reviews.title: Cats don't care, no scent to the bags
customer_reviews.text: I would never have guessed that these were catnip bags. There's no scent and our two cats could care less. They lay on the bag but no more than they do when we give them a plain paper bag. The size is nice, as they are wider than grocery store paper bags and our cats are both big guys at 15 pounds. The paper is thick and stays open better than regular paper bags. But I won't be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney D

customer_reviews.title: My cat who hates everything and everyone loves this silly shoot to death!
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness my cat is obsessed! This was her christmas gift and she instantly started dragging this tunnel all over the house with her and grooming the dangly feather toy and meowing little kitty "thank yous" at me and her cat dad! Shes havi g trouble figuring out that she can go in the tune but hey shes not the sharpest tool in the tool shed lol shell figure it out and I dont think shell ever come out again (well except probably to eat!)
customer_reviews.author: Jill Murray

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and well made cat tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: It's everything a cat could want! Very well made, crinkle sounds when you they touch it, attached flyers hanging and even lights to encourage play! My adult cat couldn't care less. He's touched it twice on his own in like 2 months we've had it. If you toss in a treat he goes right in and then out of the hole. He is not amused. LOL
customer_reviews.author: The David

customer_reviews.title: Obssessed
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this! The lights are a nice function. Our orange tabby will go in this full speed. The hole on the top is great because if you throw a toy in, he will dive head forward. It is also fun to shake it when he is in there and spin it around. He loves to go for the ride!
customer_reviews.author: KS

customer_reviews.title: It's cheap,  just buy it.
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The Lights DO work but they're a bit confusing. You have to turn the switch on then, the lights will only come on to movement! It took a minute to figure it out. Lights or no lights, my bonus cats love it!
customer_reviews.author: Kandyce Macchi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Toy For Cats!!
customer_reviews.text: My cat absolutely loves this! She can’t stop playing with it. She plays with it and me during the day, and she also plays with it all by herself. And once you turn on the lights - that only flash when she runs through it - oh boy, she’ll play with it for hours. At nighttime, I’ll just hear the sound of her running through it - LOL. It took me a little time to get used to the sound!!
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, lasting fun
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is a 14-pound Nebelung, and he usually bends or destroys toys like this pretty quickly. This one is sturdy and maintains both its shape and his interest. He loves pouncing through either end or the hole in the middle, and we often find him lurking inside. The lights don't seem to do anything for him, but the sound is exciting. He's played with it long after he'd have started ignoring other toys.
customer_reviews.author: Jame Scholl

customer_reviews.title: who had a kitten crinkle sack before and loved it. I actually had to take it away ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my ferrets, who had a kitten crinkle sack before and loved it. I actually had to take it away from them because the fibers caught their claws and caused injuries to two of them. If something is only sleeping in it, then it's probably fine, but be wary if a cat or other animal is clawing or digging at it as it will come apart.
customer_reviews.author: Dori F.

customer_reviews.title: Cat hates it vit still well constructed
customer_reviews.text: My cat hates enclosures so not sure why I bought this. Lol. Still...it's well made and the cat has on occasion investigated it, slowly by sniffing it. Maybe one day she'll actually play in it. Overall, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: B. Pralat

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: One of my cats loves playing in and out of this tunnel. It's very sturdy and I love the lights, the cat I am not so sure. My feral cat doesn't like it at all. He is scared of being trapped inside. If it was clear maybe he wouldn't mind. The same happened with the cat flap. I have a clear one that he is not scared of using as he can see that it's safe to go in, the same doesn't happen with a normal flap. Maybe with a clear tunnel he would feel safe too. Maybe one day.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: FUN!
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves this bag and her favorite part is the little dangly flower on the front...she drags the bag around by pulling on it. Hours of fun watching her run into it or pounce on it! Great construction and wonderful customer service!
customer_reviews.author: Tricia Lashley

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loved this.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat is easily bored of most toys, but she has stuck with this one for well over a month. She took to it right away and now is one of her favorite hideouts. A definite bargain!!
customer_reviews.author: Joey L

customer_reviews.title: Cats not that fond of it
customer_reviews.text: Pros: the price (compared to what is charged in Pet stores); it does not fold up (like some tunnels I've seen); good qualit; nice length. Cons: width - the tunnel could be wider; width more suitable for kittens and/or petite adult cats My cat prefers a tunnel I purchased from Target (Boots and ?? brand), although that one folds up each time he runs through (but I think he enjoys that part of it. It just comes down to your cat's preference. At the price, it's worth a try unless you have an overweight cat or a large cat in which case they probably won't fit into the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Holly J Parenteau

customer_reviews.title: My new kitten loved this within minutes
customer_reviews.text: My new bundle of joy was playing with this tunnel on Day 2 of her arrival to my house. It has been 5 days now and she still can't get enough of it. It especially works well on hard wood floors because it slides with her every movement keeping the activity and noises going. She did tear off the little dangly feather thing, but overall it has given her hours of playtime.
customer_reviews.author: hogie9954

customer_reviews.title: Lots of fun play time!!!
customer_reviews.text: My 2year old cat wore out previous tunnel—she loves it—pushes it to you when she wants you to play with her—which is about 10 times a day!?
customer_reviews.author: Nona In Jersey

customer_reviews.title: Loud and lights
customer_reviews.text: I can’t really enjoy this. The only part I don’t like is the whistling sound it makes which is intentional because of the fabric they put inside of it.
customer_reviews.author: Jpalagruto

customer_reviews.title: Great toy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was initially a little scared of this, but now it is his favorite thing and he even likes to sleep in it!
customer_reviews.author: H R

customer_reviews.title: Nice for Cats - Not for Rabbits
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately for me, I bought this for my bunnies and the "crinkle" in the tunnel just scared them away. Good quality for cats, but I could not use it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Great iten
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, made well. We thought our kitten would love this because she is always trying to climb into trash and grocery bags. Sadly she has zero interest in this, but that doesn’t make it a bad product. Well made and exactly what we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Pretty Kitty

customer_reviews.title: Lights never worked
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my sister's cat had one and loved it. However, when it arrived, it didn't light up. I figured it came with a dead battery so I bought new batteries but it still wouldn't light up. Guess I got a dud. My cat still likes to dash through it but I could have bought a cheaper tunnel without the lights if I had known the lights on this wouldn't work.
customer_reviews.author: RugbyGirl

customer_reviews.title: Cat loved it from the minute I opened it.
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loved this from the minute I set it out. He has always loved to lay on papers or anything that crinkles so I thought this would be a good fit. The lights are small and red. i wouldn't say they twinkle, they just turn off and on (all at the same time). The only negative is that they don't stay on long. They are motion activated but they only blink for a few seconds unless you move again. I would have liked to see white lights and them stay on longer. Our cat is fairly large-13 lbs- but he fit just fine. Overall, satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kim W.

customer_reviews.title: Best Cat Tunnel in the market!
customer_reviews.text: This is truly the BEST Cat Tunnel around. I have purchased many and this one is GREAT! It keeps it's SHAPE so you never have to keep opening it up when it goes flat, like all the other cat tunnels out there! I only wish it came in a nicer brighter color, as the color is rather drab. If you're looking for a cat tunnel that 'spring's into action' & you never have to fuss over it, this is it!! Tampa FL
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Very small!
customer_reviews.text: Very small, only a kitten will fit in it. It’s a shame because my cats love bags and crunchy things so I was looking forward to them having this.
customer_reviews.author: Picard family

customer_reviews.title: Make your cat happy
customer_reviews.text: I got four of these for four different cat owners. Cats love them! Great sale price too.
customer_reviews.author: Tmcdonell

customer_reviews.title: Both cats love this tunnel of "fun"
customer_reviews.text: My four year old male cat and his new three month old little brother love this! I got it because it looked like a good toy for them to learn to have fun together and I was right. They run through it, roll around, chase their other toys in it etc. 3-4 times a day. It's so cute to see them playing in it-especially when they peek out the hole in the top. It seems to be well made and hopefully will last a long time. Big brother is not easily amused with cat toys but he loves this.
customer_reviews.author: ICKoolG'ma

customer_reviews.title: Cat out of hell and into the tunnel.
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, sturdy and can take a beating from a devil of a kitten! Stay away from the triple priced tunnels at petsmart and other stores! My cat loves this tunnel, the lights have been going for a few months now and haven't required a battery change. There isn't a single tear in it, even though I can hear my cat peddling her claws against it like shes digging for gold. Get a nice rod toy and have your cat run back and forth through this thing, no doubt they will be happily panting on their side instead of attacking your arms and legs! Great cat product!
customer_reviews.author: Jay Brahn

customer_reviews.title: Penny seems to like it
customer_reviews.text: At first, Penny sniffed it a bit, then ignored it and went back to her bird watching/sleeping duties. After a few days of the tube sitting around, Penny started to show interest. She hangs out in it when she's in "attack mode"...when she needs a place to wait for unsuspecting passers-by. She likes the crinkly sound the interior makes. The tunnel is well built and seems to be pretty sturdy. Hopefully it continues to entertain Penny in the long-term.
customer_reviews.author: frawgster

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES this!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have1 cat, Jelly, and she loves this toy. Stalks it from across the room and then races into it, actually sliding in the tunnel a few feet! It's really entertaining to watch so that's a plus too! She also likes to attack through the center cut out especially if I throw a toy in. I think the lights add to the chaos. Am definitely recommending to my friends with cats. If you want to see all of this in action you can go to ohjellycat on Instagram :)
customer_reviews.author: donut15

customer_reviews.title: Made my kitten sick
customer_reviews.text: I unwrapped this toy and my 9 month-old kitten immediately showed interest. He started licking and biting the edge of it. I left the room and came back in a few minutes later, and watched the cat vomit. The toy was definitely the source of the reaction, it was all wet where he had licked and bitten it. I licked the plastic material myself and it had a bitter, chemical taste. I'm not sure if the toy material itself was harmful, if I received a bad copy, or if some of the packing material rubbed on to the toy, but I won't be purchasing this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Manuel W.

customer_reviews.title: Took some time but now my cat's favorite ... uh ... thing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this and put it in the middle of the room for an adolescent cat. I thought the cat was ignoring it or didn't care but about a week later it was her absolute favorite thing. She lays in it constantly and occasionally runs through it. I can't explain why she does but it works. *Shrug*. I don't use the right light thing -- if there was a model without it, I'd buy that.
customer_reviews.author: Headphone Jack

customer_reviews.title: Not the cat's meow
customer_reviews.text: Cats didn't care for it, and it was a bit smaller than what I had thought. They couldn't really get inside it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ellrich

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this tunnel! She has been spending a great deal of time racing through it, bouncing on it and hiding in it. She is a very active 5 month old and I have desperately been searching for toys that will both keep her attention and let her get some exercise (and save my curtains from total destruction). This is a very well made tunnel and is handling her abuse quite well. Based on how my cat loves it and how sturdy it is I highly recommend this toy.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great kitty Christmas gift
customer_reviews.text: We have another chute same size, just not with the lights, and we connected the two. The cats did not seem interested at first. Our more playful female was the first to enjoy it, just sitting inside. Within a month, both young cats loved it. They love to run through at top speed, stalk each other inside it, and love to keep their toys inside. Despite pretty heavy use, the lights are still blinking after two months.
customer_reviews.author: Lily Jones

customer_reviews.title: cat loves tunnel but doesnt twinkle or light up inless i shake it hard. guess they still like it though
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVES the tunnel and Play it in every day. But I don't need tO worry about batteries because it never lights up. Only if I shake it reall hard. Was going o send it back but my kitty looked so depressed when I took her little fun house away and I'm a sucker c Ker for a kitty pout. Just too bad it didn't twinkle but gave it a 4paws up because my kitty still wanted it so much
customer_reviews.author: KJ Nolan

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love playing with this. Its also easy to fold up, and store away
customer_reviews.author: Rob V.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. They sit on top of tge bag and fight over it. Very noisy.
customer_reviews.author: Ohhitscarly

customer_reviews.title: Cheap cat toy, Cats had more fun with the cardboard box
customer_reviews.text: Poor cheap product, cats didn't like it. Tossed it out as soon as possible
customer_reviews.author: j. garza

customer_reviews.title: Built well, nice toy but none of my 4 cats like it
customer_reviews.text: I had high hopes for this toy, but none of my 4 cats like it. The only thing one of them found fascinating were the strings used to tie it shut in the compressed mode. I'm sure for some cats it is marvelous. It is built well, the lights work nicely. But for some reason no one at my house is interested in it but me..lol. Your mileage may vary based on how playful your cats are already.
customer_reviews.author: ECF

customer_reviews.title: Not worth extra $ for lights
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love tubes to play with but the lights are barely visible and are a distraction at best....simply a “novelty” that doesn’t heighten the cat’s enjoyment of the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: Scott R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Ferrets approved
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with my purchase. It was exactly what I was expecting. I bought it for my ferrets and they love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: petlinks terrific customer service department immediately sent a working replacement which ...
customer_reviews.text: i had one of these and it suddenly stopped working. i ordered another from petlinks but the item i received was sent defective from the manufacturer (not their fault). petlinks terrific customer service department immediately sent a working replacement which i received within a day or two. would definitely buy from them again, thank you michelle!
customer_reviews.author: paul  p

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my crazy tabby
customer_reviews.text: He loves it and plays inbit everyday. I can't ask for much more.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Depends on your cat
customer_reviews.text: We have several indoor cats. All of the features of this sounded like something that would delight them all - flashing lights, crinkly sounds, etc. However, only one young one has played in it at all. No ambushing & pouncing & frenetic fun that we expected, even sprinkling catnip inside. Completely puzzling, but that cats say "No, thanks".
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Tinker

customer_reviews.title: This is a blast to use when playing with my ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a blast to use when playing with my cat! She loves this, even after a number of years. It is made of crinkle material and has a hole for her to peak out of in the center of the chute. She loves this toy!
customer_reviews.author: Jorgie's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Best toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: Sheldon is a 13-week old short-haired tabby that we adopted 6 weeks ago. Sheldon has made my hubby and I very happy. We're in love. He didn't need any encouragement. I opened the tunnel and he ran into it. He's been playing for 15'. I'm very happy with this purchase. There's nothing that makes me happier than seeing my baby enjoying himself.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina M-P

customer_reviews.title: Our Bengal loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Kona has one of those pop-up cubes and absolutely loves that thing (it's basically falling apart after a few weeks though - he tends to jump on it) so we figured this would be just as fun and hopefully hold up better. He wasn't too interested at first but now he hides out in it and loves to drag his toys in there when he catches them. The tube seems like it'll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: My cat doesn't really play with it
customer_reviews.text: I have an extremely active Sphynx. He was scared of it, then he'd run through it as fast as he could if I put some treats in it, and after doing that a few times, now he just ignores it except for the string attached to it - he jumps at the string and runs away every now and then. But I don't know if he plays with it when I'm not around. From what I can tell, it was not a success.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this toy
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these and my cats love them. We have one indoors and one on the screened porch. They are great for furry battles, hiding smaller toys, waiting to pounce on passers-by and naps. I am amazed they have stood up so well to all the use they get. I will definately purchase some again when these have worn out.
customer_reviews.author: FW

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats and both took to this very quickly. It's not something they can crawl into, but they love laying on it.
customer_reviews.author: Aravoure

customer_reviews.title: My one kitten loves it and the other ignores it
customer_reviews.text: First off, the lights rarely go off. The cat has to almost pounce directly on the small control box for the lights to work. I don't think they care anyway about the lights. My male kitten loves the crinkle and the hole in the middle. Our female kitten (who is very playful as well) just never seemed to have any interest in it.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Fit felines only!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this chute little chute for an upcoming litter of puppies. I'm glad they will be small because I didn't double check the dimensions and it's a pretty small toy. If you've got a big kitty (or puppy) you're expecting to fit through you may be out of luck! I will update about wear and tear durability once I know more!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My cat lives in his tube
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this tube so much we bought a second one just in case this one ever rips (it hasn’t).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The crinkle noise makes her happy, too
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this tunnel ! She plays in it, ambushes me when I walk past her ( while in it ) , sleeps in it as well. The crinkle noise makes her happy , too ! Well worth the money spent and the entertainment for all of us!
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Most of my cats loved this!!
customer_reviews.text: My cats would run in and out of it, end to end, and then jump down in the top opening! Hysterical to watch them. And my cats are 6 years old! Highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: sam scott

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great toy. Our cats have played with this thing for years-hours and hours of fun and hiding..sometimes simple is best!
customer_reviews.author: Mermaid in a Mudslide

customer_reviews.title: Big enough for a kitten. That's all.
customer_reviews.text: How disappointing; hoped it would bring joy to my four cats but it's ridiculously small. Only the kitten (6 months old) could get in it. She'll outgrow it in 3-4 months, so it's useless to me. I'll be returning this.
customer_reviews.author: B. M. Knowles

customer_reviews.title: ... huge hit at first but they now seem to love it. sounds like plastic bags
customer_reviews.text: not a huge hit at first but they now seem to love it. sounds like plastic bags. They are not very interested in the blinking lights but for some cats that could be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Too small for me!
customer_reviews.text: I guess the 3 stars is a bit lower than I should rate this product, but it just didn't work for me. It is of good quality materials, and the lights are a bit unique. But this is a SMALL tunnel. My cats avoided it because it was too confining for them.
customer_reviews.author: Petra Jennai

customer_reviews.title: Extremely noisy!
customer_reviews.text: I have two playful brother kitties, and they ended up not being interested in this at all. Every time they touch or bump this tube, it makes a LOT of noise, which scared them quite a bit. I ended up returning it, since it wasn't a good fit with them. Maybe good if your cats don't mind loud noises though.
customer_reviews.author: Cat D. and Co

customer_reviews.title: Crinkle crinkle
customer_reviews.text: I have numerous cats and they all love this toy and use it constantly! The only issue I have had is when it's rolled up it has 2 strings used to tie the item together, I've had to cut this off because my cats attempted to eat them, but the toy itself is loved by all my critters.
customer_reviews.author: William M. Mccarter

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loved the tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Our cat loved the tunnel. We sprinkled some cat nip inside and he went crazy. I can't give it 5 stars though because the twinkle lights never worked. Still a great cat toy though.
customer_reviews.author: Linz

customer_reviews.title: Awesome cat tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cat tunnel! We got the green color. My cats get excited if they just hear me move it and it crinkles. This will be good for hours and hours of fun :)
customer_reviews.author: Kamixa

customer_reviews.title: It is durable and fun for her to play with
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this product. She runs into it with toys and plays. She also hides in the tube and jumps out at people. It is durable and fun for her to play with. You can put a want toy dangling in the top hole and your cat will go nuts.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: ( It seems like several people get the same condition
customer_reviews.text: I got this with broken light.. :( It seems like several people get the same condition. I returned this.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat LOVED LOVED LOVED this tunnel. She will wait at one end for us to prompt her to run through. she takes her toys in there to play with them. She takes a nap in it too. She just loves it. It is made very sturdy she is not quite a yr old yet but she is a little chubby and it is holding up well to her pouncing on it. The lights are a little extra bonus she likes them too. Just an all around great product for a cat to enjoy.
customer_reviews.author: lilblondecurlz

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Cat loves it. Makes a crinkly noise and lights up. Also has a “window“ and seems to be a little sturdier than a different tunnel we have. Great buy for the price.
customer_reviews.author: k. ryan

customer_reviews.title: very small
customer_reviews.text: It's very small not suitable for adult cat but for kitten and my cat is quite thin. I wish to find one bigger , because it's a great bag
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I liked it but the cats I bought it for never ...
customer_reviews.text: I liked it but the cats I bought it for never did get over their distrust. Oh well... I tried. They seem to prefer hiding under the bed, or curling up under the Christmas tree limbs instead. Cats!
customer_reviews.author: thoughtful reader

customer_reviews.title: Best cat toy ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my two cats Meekoo and Elvis. I move it around different places in my house and my kids(cats) act like it a new toy every time. The lites on it is a nice touch. Amazon thanks for another great product for my kids!!
customer_reviews.author: jj

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle Chute
customer_reviews.text: They should call this the Krinkle Chute, this thing really does krinkle but the cats love it and I think that sounds does attract them. It does come with a light system but it does not come with battteries.
customer_reviews.author: John V.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Cat Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this cat chute, she runs thru it several times a day, my only complaint is it did not light up after the batterys were installed but that wwas really no big deal, she likes playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Bev

customer_reviews.title: Pure Trash
customer_reviews.text: I gave it one star because there wasn't anything lower. We opened it, set it up. No lights. We checked the batteries. They were clearly dead and had leaked. Our cats took a look. Some took a walk through and that was it. We returned it. We are impressed with the ease of return
customer_reviews.author: Tom Barron

customer_reviews.title: FUN!!
customer_reviews.text: my cats do enjoy running through this chute and going crazy, sometimes even coming out the hole in the side!!! We sometimes will wiggle our finger on the other end to get them motivated to "hunt"....very fun!!!
customer_reviews.author: Twinmom

customer_reviews.title: Fun For Every Kitty
customer_reviews.text: I bought tghis as a gift for my best friend's cat. She is one year old and loves the chute. I bought it primarily based on other Amazon reviews tha all seemed very positive. I wanted to get something that the cat wouldn't get bored with. Weeks later and the cat is still playing in it like it's just came out of the box. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Bertorelli

customer_reviews.title: Cozy cove
customer_reviews.text: Cats immediately went berserk playing inside the lights make it fun in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Kneeland

customer_reviews.title: Great Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this tunnel. He is 13 years old but chases through it or lies inside resting. He loves the crinkling sound and he pounces through the openings for toys. He even plays with it alone sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Inga Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Lights work. It really did not appeal to my two cats
customer_reviews.author: William J. Love

customer_reviews.title: Effectively a mat not a bag
customer_reviews.text: Supposed to be a bag they can crawl into, does gape open so in effect both in but a mat.
customer_reviews.author: BLK

customer_reviews.title: Broke! Long wait
customer_reviews.text: waited several weeks to get. Will not light up. Bought new batteries and still won't work.
customer_reviews.author: lisa wood

customer_reviews.title: good product
customer_reviews.text: This seems like a good product. I have a bunch of "fraidy cats" who are startled by unexpected noise. They don't like it or use it. But if your cat like to pounce on crumpled paper and like to burrow, I'm think you would like this product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun for play time & sometimes our cat uses it just to chill out by himself. Lights are nice but wouldn't be necessary, since we pay more attention to them than the cat does.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: My 4 cats love it. They don't seem to care about it lighting up but I think it looks cool.
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Scaredeeeee Cat!
customer_reviews.text: My cat is too scared to go into it. The noise and the feel I think scares her the most. This is a nice size tube but would only recommend that you start them as kittens and not for adult cats.
customer_reviews.author: Bullwinkle

customer_reviews.title: Great fun that our cat never gets tired of!
customer_reviews.text: Our 8 month old kitten absolutely loves this tunnel. She runs through it all the time at very high speeds. Very well made and the blinking lights are an added treat!
customer_reviews.author: D. Young

customer_reviews.title: Half as fun as it should be
customer_reviews.text: One half of the tunnel doesn't light up. I also thought there would be more motion sensors, but aside from that the sensor closest to the battery pack is the only one that seems to work decently. I was really excited to get this for my two kittens. I'm hoping I will be able to somehow talk with the manufacturer/someone who can fix this problem for me; it seems like the lights on my tunnel are defective.
customer_reviews.author: meg faulkenberry

customer_reviews.title: My big girl, loves this!
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I didn't think my big girl would love this due to her size. Little did I know, she loves it! She's 7 years old, and is about 12 pounds. Her size doesn't stop her one bit, she runs in and out and plays peek a' boo, with her 10 month old sister. Thank you so much for this product, it's a hit in our household!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal Stringer

customer_reviews.title: Cats just love things like this.
customer_reviews.text: It has everything a cat loves, for the price their Human loves. Inside its dark, makes that crinkle sound, AND they can run through it. Oh, and what's this, it folds up to be the size of a large book. Win-win-win. I almost want to get more and build a kitty maze...
customer_reviews.author: Jordan W.

customer_reviews.title: Petlinks System Twinkle Chute Cat Tunnel,
customer_reviews.text: the wire eventually pokes thru on the ends - not safe until repaired. I thought it would last longer.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Sallie-Hill

customer_reviews.title: best cat toy ever!
customer_reviews.text: best cat toy ever! my cat and my dogs love playing with this toy. my goldens roll the cat around in it while the cat attacks them out of the hole in the middle. very entertaining for all of us!
customer_reviews.author: smaasch

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy this for my cat, just because she can be pretty finicky about toys, but she ADORES this!! She plays with this quite often, and especially loves to run through it and jump at my dogs to scare them! This product is MUCH cheaper than the products offered at pet stores, and seems to be a higher quality! I would definitely buy this product again!!
customer_reviews.author: Florida Girl

customer_reviews.title: Fun tunnels, cats enjoy them
customer_reviews.text: Cats love these tunnels, hide toys when playing and they charge and dive into them, love the crunchy sounds and lights, they seem to have fun!
customer_reviews.author: Drewsmama

customer_reviews.title: cat tunnel
customer_reviews.text: cat loves the strings on the one end more than the tunnel but once in awhile he does explore inside the tunnel and pops his head out of the top opening. exc. quality materials.
customer_reviews.author: D. Owen

customer_reviews.title: Kittens love this thing!
customer_reviews.text: Its very loud with its crinkle noise but by the level of noise they're making, clearly they're having fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Twinkle cat tunnel
customer_reviews.text: Our daughters cats love this thing we already have one so i knew they would love it. Great company.
customer_reviews.author: Sunrise to Sunset "Paul"

customer_reviews.title: Good cat toy, but youe cat might not play with it in front of you
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it, but doesn't really play around in it when I'm around. If I leave her by herself with this though, she runs through it like you see on YouTube. Just not when I'm playing with her :(
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Cats had no interest in it.
customer_reviews.text: This item arrived fast, but after a couple weeks, our cats still had no interest in it. We ended up gifting it to a very large bunny who's getting much more use of it.
customer_reviews.author: Keki

customer_reviews.title: Our cats like it!
customer_reviews.text: Cute toy that folds away when they are not playing. We have enjoyed watching our three cats have fun in the tunnel.
customer_reviews.author: dhudson

customer_reviews.title: Chute Cat Toy
customer_reviews.text: My cats wont use this item. It was a wasteful purchase for me. It just take up space in the house. Wont buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Lorraine Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Too small for full grown cats!
customer_reviews.text: Really small..kittens could enjoy it but too narrow or tight for full grown cats. I wasted my money because my daughters two cats don't play with it.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon Campbell

product_meta.title: Petlinks Tunnel and Hideout Cat Toys
product_meta.description: Style:Twinkle ChuteA cat's independent streak is a natural instinct related to their need to hunt. Domestic cats have few outlets for the solitary activities they often crave; Twinkle Chute provides your cat with solo play and privacy that can fulfill their needs and enrich their lives. The crackly surface and touch-activated lights of the Twinkle Chute adds to the interactivity and fun and will quickly become one of your cat's favorite toys in the house.
feature_bullets: Crackling tunnel toy that features motion-activated lights
Spring loaded chute pops up easily
Includes on/off switch to turn control play time
